title: [III].Myth.III.-.The.Wolf.Age.iso
description:
So, I wanted to play this old game, and couldn't find a working torrent anywhere.
Then I remembered I'd already downloaded this ages ago, so I dug out the ISO.

Although this game is old, it runs np on my pc which is somewhat overkill for the game.. (Vista Ultimate x64, DirectX 10, nVidia GeForce GTX 295).

To get it to work I had to set some Compatibility tab options on "Myth3.exe":
Windows 98 / Windows Me
Run in 640 x 480 screen resolution
Disable visual themes
Disable desktop composition

Some of them I could untick after the first time I ran it, see what works for you.

Computer may not be on 24/7 but I will seed it.

Also, I do have the previous two games *somewhere* if somebody is after them.
